Henri Cook is the current owner of '''Orion Internet Services Ltd.''' a VoIP, Website and VPS Hosting Service formed in late 2007. At this point in time he is completing a Masters degree in Computer Science at Durham University and moonlights as a member of the Ubuntu Server Team.

Past experiences include summer work for Citrix Systems Ltd., Morgan Stanley, Durham University and various web design customers.
